net.sf.jclal.util.mail

Class SenderEmail

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.util.mail.SenderEmail
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IConfigure, JCLAL

    public class SenderEmail
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConfigure
    Utility class to send email, this class must be associated with a algorithm's listener.
    Author:
    Oscar Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • configure

        public void configure(org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration configuration)
        Description copied from interface: IConfigure
        Configuration method.
        Specified by:
        configure in interface IConfigure
        Parameters:
        configuration - The configuration of SenderEmail. The XML labels supported are:
        • smtp-host= ip
        • smtp-port= int
        • to= email
        • from= email
        • attach-report-file=boolean
        • user=String
        • pass=String
